entry.title: Bonne Maman - Wild Blueberry Jam Mini Jars Kosher - 15 x 1 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bonne Maman
Type: BAKING
Price: 19.99

Add a touch of sweetness to your bakery, restaurant, or cafe with this Kosher honey..!

Now your patrons can satisfy their craving for something sweet on-the-go with the convenience of this honey! The name is highly recognized in just about any venue, and their premium selection of spreads upholds a tradition of full-bodied flavor, great quality, and value. These handy portion cups bring the syrupy sweetness and traditional taste of pure honey to your restaurant, diner, school cafeteria, or convenience store. Their 1 oz. size is perfectly-portioned for a single serving, and your customers can even grab them on the go with their take-out meals.

Honey offers a quick and easy way to enhance menu items with its pleasing aroma and sweet, classic taste. It's the perfect complement to toast, biscuits, hot teas, or spiced ciders. Rather than buying honey in bulk jars, these portion cups are easy to serve in caddies on your tabletop or hotel breakfast bar. Collected from sweet honey-comb and containing no additives, this honey provides just the right amount of satisfying sweetness to your customers' dishes.

The secret of Bonne Maman jam is very simple – its ingredients. Using only perfect fruits and natural sugar, carefully prepared with Bonne Maman’s traditional expertise, creates the memorable taste that is Bonne Maman. A delicious moment to cherish – every time.

entry.title: Olde Style - Honey - 200 x 14 g

Vendor: Olde Style
Type: FOOD
Price: 50.59

Olde Style - Honey - 200 x 14 g

PRODUCT INFORMATION

W.T. Lynch Foods only uses Canadian produced Honey, to guarantee an excellent product.

USE IDEAS

A versatile food that can be put on top of toast, oatmeal, yogurt. Can also be used as a sweetener in tea and coffee.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Ready to use.

INGREDIENTS 

Pure Honey.

Type: FOOD

Kraft Heinz - Liquid Honey - 140 x 14 g

  • The brand your customers know and love
  • Great for on-the-go applications
  • Delicious day-starters, but ideal throughout, including breakfast, lunch, dinner, and irresistible snack times in between
  • Ready to eat. Open the portion cup and pour.
  • One 14g portion cup = one serving size

entry.title: Aurora - Pure Wildflower Honey - 500 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: BAKING
Price: 6.99

Add a touch of sweetness to your bakery, restaurant, or cafe with this Wild Flower honey..!

Looking for honey that's purely sweet and delicious without the additives and preservatives? This all natural honey is perfect for your bakery or restaurant! Whether your establishment specializes in farm-to-table fare or homemade-style baked goods, this honey brings bold flavors and nutrients from the honeybees to the table. Buying in bulk also saves you money and ensures your establishment is always fully supplied with this flavorful sweetener.

Versatile Ingredient

This all natural honey is a delicious way to get creative in the kitchen! Its fragrant flavor and velvety texture makes it the perfect complement to a variety of savory dishes, from classic honey-baked ham and sweet breads to sticky honey-glazed chicken! Use it to sweeten homemade granola or decadent yogurt parfaits. You can even try dissolving a spoonful to a steaming hot cup of tea. No matter how you choose to use it, your patrons are sure to love its sweet taste and subtle tang!

Classic Golden Color

This pure honey is collected from sweet honeycomb and is free from unwanted additives. It is naturally gluten-free with a classic golden color and a sweet, light taste.

Great Alternative to Sugar

This all natural honey is great for stirring into batters and kneading into dough for delectable cakes and lightly sweetened breads. Because it is so sweet, less honey is required to sweeten baked goods than sugar, making it a cost-effective option.
